title: 04/15/2021 - Hour 1 - Matt Miller
itunes:title: 04/15/2021 - Hour 1 - Matt Miller
description:
Chris Broussard & Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and after last night's game between the Nets and the Sixers, they're telling you why a Nets finals win would be terrible for the NBA! ESPN NFL Draft Analyst Matt Miller joins the guys for all the latest info on NFL Draft Prospects, and why Baker Mayfield isn't under any more pressure this year after Jadeveon Clowney's signing!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
